title: Wedding Logo
content:
Hi folks, my wedding is coming up and I've drawn up a monogram/ligature for us to use. It's based on Aphrodite, but I've tried to redraw it to do what I want. I'm having some trouble taming the Bezier curves to feel right...I'm curious at this point to see what others think before I continue with this! Please help!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Ligature-Rework.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108224132/http:/typophile.com/files/Ligature-Rework_0.jpg) | 100.67 KB |
author: CuedUp

comments.content: Forms are pretty solid. I'd just bring the ampersand and A away from the H a little bit.
